DOC.brief_summary: A study to compare pre-operative administration of rofecoxib versus post-operative administration of diclofenac or rofecoxib, respectively, in the treatment of post-operative pain after total knee joint replacement in patients with osteoarthritis of the knee.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of Rofecoxib in the Treatment of Post-Operative Pain After Total Knee Joint Replacement (0966-259)
DOC.criteria: Males or females at least 18 years of age who have osteoarthritis of the knee and have undergone total knee joint replacement.
